name: Supply Guy
description:
This is my entry for the My First Game Jam - Summer 2022.

The goal of the game is to help your teammates to not run out of resources. For that, you need to choose a mate to help and move to the resource spot to pick and deliver it right back to your mate. After that, pick another one...

There is more features planned for the game, as described in it's devlog on the game jam community post or on my project's newsletter.

Please, feel free to play and give any feedback for suggestions on the game loop improvement.

How to  play:

Move: WASD/Arrow keys
Grab a resource/deliver it to a mate: Space key

Changelog:

v0.2 (current)

  • Resized game area to fit current gameplay
  • Added score system

v0.1

  • Initial Release
